response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by myself. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what you'd find on the market. Given its value to you, I propose we strike a deal at $140. This way, you get a great product at a reasonable price, and I can ensure it goes to someone who appreciates it fully. What do you think?", "product_price": 140}
